info.description:
SIP Event Publishing API can be used to integrate existing systems of engagement with GTD.  Our production API does not provide swagger capabilities.  What you see below is provided for reference, but any attempts to use it will result in a 401 unauthorized error.  Please use the integration swagger API for testing.

See https://sip-pipeline-integration.mybluemix.net/swagger-ui.html#/
info.title: SIP Event Publish API

post.description: The gate in is also the truck's actual arrival time. It includes all actual gate in events, both on export and import side (which can optionally be indicated by parameter) and for full and empty containers truck moves. The common types of such moves include:  - Actual time of arrival (gate in) of empty container for export load at stuffing site. - Actual time of arrival (gate in) of full contaienr at export terminal. - Actual time of arrival (gate in) of packed container at import inland stripping location. - Actual time of arrival (gate in) of empty container at depot (terminal or inland location) after stripping.

post.description: The planned gate in is also the truck's estimated time of arrival. It includes all gate in estimate events, both on export and import side (which can optionally be indicated by parameter) and for full and empty containers truck moves. The common types of such moves include:  - Estimated time of arrival of the empty container for export load at stuffing site. - Estimated time of arrival of packed container at the export terminal. - Estimated arrival time for packed container at import inland stripping location. - Estimated time of arrival of empty container at the depot.

post.description: The gate out is also the truck's actual time of departure. It includes all actual gate out events, both on export and import side (which can optionally be indicated by parameter) and for full and empty containers truck moves. The common types of such moves include:  - Actual time of departure (gate out) of empty container from depot. - Actual time of departure (gate out) of packed container from stuffing site at inland location. - Actual time of departure (gate out) of packed container from import terminal.  - Actual time of departure (gate out) of empty container at stripping location.

responseDelegationId.description: Provides a delegationId plus meta-data about the delegation definition used to generate the delegationId.  A delegation definition defines which types of events will be visibily when a delegationId is used to subscribe or query SIP.

importCountry.description: The final destination country where the container is stripped.

exportCountry.description: The country where the container is stuffed.

transshipmentPorts.description: Ports where off loading the container from one vessel at an intermediate destination and loading onto another vessel to be further carried to the final port of discharge.

entryPort.description: The port where the container is discharged from a vessel for the last time (Final port of discharge).

exitPort.description: The port where the container is first loaded on the vessel.

containerType.description: The container Type based on ISO size type
